/* BoardDAO.list 게시판 리스트 출력 */
SELECT B_NO bNo , TITLE title , CONTENT content , WRITER writer , G_NO gNo , STEP step , INDENT indent , VIEW_CNT viewCnt , DATE_FORMAT(REG_DATE, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i') regDate FROM tb_board ORDER BY G_NO DESC, STEP ASC

/* BoardDAO.view 게시글 내용 출력 */
SELECT B_NO bNo , WRITER writer , TITLE title , CONTENT content , G_NO gNo , STEP step , INDENT indent , VIEW_CNT viewCnt , DATE_FORMAT(REG_DATE, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i') regDate FROM tb_board WHERE B_NO = #{bNo}
mapper.update:
/* BoardDao.viewCnt 조회수 증가 */
UPDATE tb_board SET VIEW_CNT = VIEW_CNT + 1 WHERE B_NO = #{bNo}
